hero.title: HUA UX Framework
hero.description: Stop spending time on configuration. HUA UX integrates beautiful UI, smooth animations, and multilingual support into one.

features.title: Why HUA UX?
features.subtitle: A framework for both developer and user experience

integration.title: All-in-One Integration
integration.description: UI, Motion, and i18n are pre-integrated and ready to use.

presets.title: Preset System
presets.description: Apply optimal settings for your situation with Product/Marketing presets.

branding.title: Branding System
branding.description: Set colors and typography, and they're automatically applied to all components.

i18n.title: Built-in i18n
i18n.description: i18n is built-in by default, making multilingual support easy.

motion.title: Motion Hooks
motion.description: Provides declarative animation hooks like useFadeIn, useSlideUp.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Improve developer productivity with perfect type support.

packages.title: Included Packages
packages.subtitle: HUA UX integrates the following packages

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Start a new project with npx create-hua-ux or add packages to an existing project.
